summary: NPC Illia Bug fix & face change.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][i]Add the following changes to [/i][url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Illia]Illia[/url][i].[/i][/b]
[i][i][i]Face change.
[/i]Fixed AI bug[/i].[/i][i]
Set the relationship.
[/i][i][i]Learned some of the Perk.
[/i]Marriable.[/i]
She uses Icy Spear instead of Ice Storm.

[color=#ff0000][b][i]Dialog does not change.[/i][/b][/color][i]

[u]
[/u][/i][i][i][b]This mod is [color=#ff0000]NOT [color=#efefef]stand-alone[/color][/color].[/b]
[/i][/i][/size][size=3][size=3]■[/size]Required Mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]

[/url][/size][size=3]■Recommended Mods[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]
[/url][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url][/size][size=3] [size=2]to v[size=3]3[/size][/size]
[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] [size=2]to v[size=3]2[/size][/size][/size][size=3]

■Credits
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit
[/url][/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665]Better Makeup for SKSE
[/url][/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]
[/url][/size]
author: chao
